benchmark_details.name: ThatiAR
benchmark_details.overview: A large dataset for subjectivity detection in Arabic news sentences, consisting of approximately 3.6K manually annotated sentences.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset that assists in detecting subjectivity in Arabic news articles, enhancing analysis of media bias and misinformation.

data.source: Manually annotated Arabic news sentences collected from various Arabic news outlets.
data.annotation: Manual annotation by crowdworkers on Amazon Mechanical Turk using tailored guidelines.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated using classification metrics focusing on the 'Subjective' class.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in identifying subjective content.
